website_summaries.verdict: Best option if you're on a budget but want a comfortable, supportive adhesive bra.
pros: Bra is available in an extended size range as well as three skin tones for a natural match
High marks for its comfortable wear, as cups are V-shaped as opposed to shallow
Totally seamless compared to others, as it's made from smooth silicone
cons: Adhesive is very sticky, so make sure you place the bra in the correct area the first time

customer_reviews.title: Keep the protective film
customer_reviews.text: I am between 34 B and 34 C, I purchase the B and it fits perfectly. For me, it does not really push my breasts up or cause much cleavege (like in the photo). However, that does not bother me at all.... I have worn the bra over 15 times already and it is still sticky and working great!... A few tips: You can unclip the cups in the middle. Unclipping them and putting each one on individuall, then reclipping then after they are on makes it easier to make them even. I would also recommend keeping the plastic covering they come with, that way you can reapply the covering after each use!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smoley

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is wonderful, sticky part is very sticky and secures in ...
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is wonderful, sticky part is very sticky and secures in one place nicely! but it will never work for saggy mom's breasts... As expected... I will be keep looking for something else, since I'm a mom... :)
customer_reviews.author: Iryna

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and secure!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I try adhesive bra. Just opened it yesterday using it to fit a party dress. It’s very comfortable and secure. The size is accurate to fit me. I was worried they would fall off at some point, however, that ‘s not the issue! Stays tight on my breast, even with dancing activities and stretching movement! Amazing bras! A must-have for party dress and summer!
customer_reviews.author: jing chen

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to get used to, but stayed put, even being sweaty for several hours
customer_reviews.text: This is the first self-adhesive bra I've ever tried. It felt a little weird and took a bit to get used to, I'm sure that's just me though :) It stayed put, no slipping, and I was sweating quit a bit. I wore it for well over 8 hours. It didn't do much in the way of 'push up,' but I may have misplaced them. I read all the tips and tricks to them on Pinterest and the product, but maybe it just takes a bit to get the hang of. I'm not giving up on it :) I have plenty of strappy tops for the summer and so this baby is gonna get used! :)
customer_reviews.author: louee

customer_reviews.title: Stays on well, not too great if you don't have some tatas to work with
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great and I can see why some girls would absolutely love these. They stayed on all night while I was sweating my face off at my friend's wedding. HOWEVER, for my itty bitty titty fam, they didn't work as I hoped. I needed some push up for a very low v neck dress and although they did give me a little volume and help my fill out the dress a bit more, they didn't do much for cleavage. But I also wore it underneath a strapless top with it clipped together and it looked good. A cup is still a little too big for me though... but that's neither here nor there lol :))))))
customer_reviews.author: Ravi S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my backless dress
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lifts! Haven’t worn it for a night out yet but i can definitely see the difference
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Eisenbach

customer_reviews.title: Small and peeling
customer_reviews.text: So I have a B cup from ages ago from a different company. Needless to say, my girls got bigger so needed something new. Very disappointed in this set. Arrived on Wednesday and wore for first and only time yesterday, Thursday. Cups are thinner which is great but no way are they D cup. Without much distance between cups since wasn't going for cleavage, the edges never stuck so there was an outline through my top. When peeling off, slowly, some of the adhesive came off and was stuck on me. The petals that come with it are nice and thin, but do not sit near as flat. You can see outline through shirt. Pictures attached.
customer_reviews.author: Elzbieta Todd

customer_reviews.title: Works for F-H cup!
customer_reviews.text: Note: This is NOT an F-cup physically, but it will support F-H cup sizes. I was surprised when it only covered like 1/2 of me.... however it holds them up like a champ. I cleaned the house in them as a test before a wedding I'm attending and I couldn't believe how well they work! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Emm

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty sticky and goes on easily enough
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes for this bra but was surprised by the quality. It is pretty sticky and goes on easily enough. The trick is how you attach it to your boobs. You have to do it just right to get the push-up effect. Will take some practice.
customer_reviews.author: JLovesToShop

customer_reviews.title: Was excited to receive them and unfortunately turned out to be a big disappointment. First of all you gotta get a size ...
customer_reviews.text: Boooooooo. Total thumbs down. This does not help at all. Was excited to receive them and unfortunately turned out to be a big disappointment. First of all you gotta get a size maybe even two up for it to maybe be successful come coverage and whenever you put together the clasp it actually just pushes your boobs down. This advertisement picture it’s total BS. I’m calling them out on straight up photoshop.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Clay

customer_reviews.title: Stuck for 2 mins then fell off?!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try these before my cruise.. I AM SO GLAD I DID!!!! They literally peeled off within 2 mins of wearing. I put on the shirt and walked to show my daughter and they started peeling off. I followed the instructions to a t. I bought according to my size and the website size. Since they are a personal item, cannot return. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: UggieFaceCrew

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 34B and I'd say this item fit well. What I didn't really like is that I didn't feel this would look natural under anything not skin tight. Without the support of something tight over it I felt a bit saggy..but maybe I'm putting it on wrong? All in all, if you're wearing it with something that will keep them in place, the adhesive is as good as any of these types of bras I've seen. I feel comfortable assuming these will get me through an entire marathon wedding day as a bridesmaid.
customer_reviews.author: SomethingWhitty

customer_reviews.title: It's worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and look of this product. However, after my SECOND time wearing it I had that "not right" feeling and apparent the clasp assembly completely pulled away from the gel cup still attached to itself. It literally left me hanging the rest of the night. So sad! I'm upping my stars for the great customer service i received. The company was very apologetic and offered to replace my item for free. I will give it another shot. Maybe i got a dud. I really loved the way it felt and looked. Even stood up to the heat. We'll see!
customer_reviews.author: jmr

customer_reviews.title: B-cup Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing — it doesn’t last forever but if you wash with soap and water and let dry, it can stand many many wearings. I am a smallish B cup and often go bra-less — this is perfect when that’s not appropriate. It also is the only stick-on I’ve tried that masks my nipples and gives me a natural lift plus a little extra. Stays on even while exercising. I use the added petals to sunbathe topless. I highly recommend this for my itty bitty committee sisters.
customer_reviews.author: Omi

customer_reviews.title: Slipps with sweat and makes you sag
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for large chested women i wear 36DDD/36DD depending on the brand wore this finally after buying it sometime ago. Kept slipping off my chest i felt the entire time self conscious about how much it showed as it kept slipping I'm from Florida so this doesn't work if you are sweating in hot climate
customer_reviews.author: JU*ReView!

customer_reviews.title: 34 B - Wedding Dress & Honeymoon fav
customer_reviews.text: These cutlets were the perfect answer to providing some 'moveable' cleavage to my sheer back wedding dress as an alternative to sewing padded cups directly into the dress. I used this for many tanks and dresses on the honeymoon over the past month, as an alternative to my uncomfortably banded strapless bras. I wash it with warm soapy water and air dry - and it retains its stick and shape. I'd replace this every summer if needed.
customer_reviews.author: mam934

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear for my senior pictures. First off, the package arrived damaged. I had tried them on as soon as I got them and they fit perfect but I only had them on for about five minutes. When my picture day came, I put them on and the right one started falling apart, the padding was coming apart from the adhesive at the buckle, I had to duct tape it down to keep an air bubble out. And yes I took care of them exactly how the package said to.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Massey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing silicone adhesive bras for over a year, these are by far the most comfy form fitting ones I have ever used. I feel like i am bra-less, it does not feel like anything is on at all. They Stick on so nicely they NEVER feel like they will fall off. I love that they include 2 nipple covers as well. I dont like wearing bras i do not find them comfortable at all- these are amazing and i highly recommend. Mine usually last about 3-5 months depending. So i will definitely give you an update
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best sticky bra ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought size F and i wear 34DDD size bra for reference and usually a size Medium in tops. Fits perfectly! I never thought I would be able to wear a sticky bra but i love this one! I haven’t been able to wear it out yet but it fits great doesn’t seem to move at all or unstick for the half hour I wore it while trying on cami type shirts I’ve tried many sticky bras and none fit my larger breasts like this one.. since most only go up to a size C Bonus* comes in a little zip pouch to store it in! And nipple covers
customer_reviews.author: Yellow

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, especially the fact that they clasp together because it gives the breasts a little more support and cleavage. I've worn them twice so far, each time lasting over 6 hours, so in my opinion, that's good. I washed it with soap and water and they maintained the adhesive. I don't know how many more times i can wear it, but so far, I like it. It looks good with spaghetti strap dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive was awesome. This bra sticks well and stays put
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to wear with a backless dress for a wedding. The adhesive was awesome. This bra sticks well and stays put. That being said, it was a tad small. I ordered the largest size and I am a 38 D. I would not recommend this bra if you will have a tight fitting fabric that will show the silhouette or you will see every detail. Luckily my dress was a wrap/drape front and I felt confidant in this. After the first 20 minutes of having it on I forgot it was there and actually turned out to be VERY comfortable. Just wish it had a bit more coverage so I would be able to wear it with more.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Unkefer

customer_reviews.title: No. Just no.
customer_reviews.text: Sending back. I ordered a push up as I had one before from jcp and it worked amazing. But this isn’t a push up even though it says it is on the box. There is no push up or padding like a push up bra has whatsoever in this bra. Also, I usually fill out a 34B, so I ordered accordingly and it is huge. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by performance
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3", 115lb, and a 32DD. I bought the "D" size to wear with the backless dresses/shirts I planned to bring on vacation with me and it worked great; fit was right-on for my size/frame. We were in the Caribbean so I worried about the heat, but this item performed better than expected with no slippage and the lines didn't show under any of the garments. I washed it after each wear and air-dried as instructed with no issues with subsequent uses; I used the product multiple days during the week we were there. Follow the application instructions and you shouldn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: MI Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Boob Hats
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I was hesitant on getting this. My boobs are small so I didn’t think they’d even hold a shape let alone ..I don’t know. I’m sure they weighed more than my boobs but they really held up well! I was in Florida weather, rain, humid then hot sunshine then clouds. So, it held up to all weather and boob sweat! It did start to peel at the top a slight but honestly I’d yoo can push against real quick it’s not an issue and if you aren’t sweating terribly bad then it’s perfect. Would recommend. Easy to wash and dry, read the instructions on how to care for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Received a Used Bra
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a product that clearly had already been bought and returned. The box was torn and the user guide was missing. So first of all, gross. Second, there’s no way they are C cups like the box says. Just holding them up to my chest I can tell they are at least a D and even look a little bigger than that.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off!
customer_reviews.text: My every day bra is a B cup, however in the past, ordering sticky bras in the past I find they run small. So I ordered a C cup. Woah, I shouldn’t ordered a D cup. I mean, the bra does the job okayish but it would do a lot better if it had more surface area to work with. I do like how you apply the bra then clasp it together instead of having a drawstring type of function. The nipple pasties that come with it are great as well. The sizing is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Early review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in what should of been my size and they were way to small. The stickyness didn't seem to good but it may have been because they didn't fit but I will update when I get the replacement ones which are going to be a d cup vs the b cup I ordered. (My normal size is between a B and a C but the B cup I received was more like a AA cup so buy larger.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT & IS VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this product, but I have to say that I am very impressed with it. I wear a size 38D bra, so I ordered size according to that. Fit perfectly and held up during 2 hours of dancing at a concert. Pushed my breasts together to make great cleavage with my sexy top. Love this and will be wearing it again soon.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. I already have perky boobs so the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I already have perky boobs so the coverage is nice and the clamp gives a little extra cleavage if you want to feel sexy. I can see it might be a problem if you have larger breasts or not perky. I’m a 32DD and the D fit fine. Definitely prefer the sticky boobs over pasties as they don’t leave ugly puffy nipple outlines. Recommend 😃 also, strapless back is definitely a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stayed in place for 10+ hours
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to a wedding, where my fiancé was the best man (so early arrival and late departure), in 90 degree weather. I'm not gonna lie, I was incredibly sweaty, but these things stayed in place the whole time and made me look perky af. Super comfortable too. Honestly I wasn't expecting much since I have tiny boobs and have never had luck with anything strapless but these were fantastic, I'd rate them ten stars if I could. Well worth what I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive lasts long and is very supportive
customer_reviews.text: Usually sticky strapless, backless bras and a hit or miss. I need a sticky bra to wear with my bridesmaids dress for my sisters wedding and this one was perfect. I’m even considering it for my wedding day to go with my dress. You definitely can get multiple uses out of it if you take care of it, clean it and reapply the plastic wrap covers. Once I got it into place it didn’t move and I didn’t feel like it was coming off due to sweat or anything. Definitely recommend this if you need a sticky bra.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Conklin

customer_reviews.title: If you have a larger bust, don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find a good sticky/backless bra that actually works for largest busts for what seems like forever. Based on reviews, I thought this might be fine. I am a 36DD and it didn't do anything for me. I could barely get it to stick/stay on me and it was clearly waaaaay too small so now I'm just stuck with something I'm never going to use.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly an opened and used item. It was also supposed to include gel nipple covers and did not. I am not going to risk my health by trying this on to see if it does the job. The fact that I received a used item with missing product is enough for a return and 1 star reviews
customer_reviews.author: A. Garin

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive
customer_reviews.text: For a DD it didn’t fit like other DD strapless bras and didn’t give much support. Wore it in addition to another bra and had ok support then. (Neither alone did the trick). In addition when I took the bra off, the inside of the cups (which were stuck to my breasts) was soaked with liquid- I guess since your skin can’t breath with the plastic- and my skin smelled like plastic. Was hopeful with the reviews it would be a good buy- maybe it’s because I needed a DD, I’m a 34DD for a regular bra, it didn’t holdup to the other reviews or what....
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M Quinn

customer_reviews.title: August in a Bridesmaid Dress
customer_reviews.text: These adhere well. I wore them all day to a summer family wedding in my floor length bridesmaids dress. I danced, I sweat, I ran around, I ate and drank too much, I had a good time and I didn't worry about my girls at all. That says a lot because my dress was kind of lower cut and I was trying to keep it classy with family. They also held up well and are still in good shape to be reused. These have decent support and lift for my 32C chest. The amount of padding/thickness was just right to keep the headlights from showing without being chicken cutlets. The flower things were a nice bonus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly big enough for my boobs lol
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a different product in a size D from this brand before and it was pretty small so I ordered a DD in this style. I'm a size 36D/DD and was surprised to see how much bigger this one was than my last one. It took me a few adjustments to get the look I wanted but it's awesome! You can't even see the outer lining of the bra. The only thing that would probably show is the strap in the middle, but other than that minor thing it's seamless. Overall would recommend for those who need their girls pushed in together! Not for lifting though.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Yang

customer_reviews.title: Best Big Boob Stick On Strapless Bra Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a G this only goes up to an F but I decided to order it and worst case return it if it didn’t fit. If they had a G I definitely would order it however this one works perfectly. It does exactly what I want it to do and as long as I follow the directions and keep it clean and put the original wrapper back on in between each use it should continue to stick. If not I will come back and update this review but so far I’m in love!!
customer_reviews.author: GiaHeller

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review before, that is how impressed I am with this product. I am a 34G and ordered the size F. The cups are large enough for me. They stick extremely well to my skin, but are not difficult or painful to remove which also makes them easy to adjust once applied. They hold me in place and feel very secure. And my cleavage looks great!! So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy- worth the money- won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product performed wayyyy better than expected. I took it on a Carribean cruise. It was hot and wore it dancing every night for 2 plus hours. Never slipped or lost it's stickiness and I could wear all of my cute halter dresses without bra straps showing. I was skeptical but thought I would try it and was super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Works great even for larger breasts
customer_reviews.text: I recommend ordering up 1 cup size. I was surprised how well they held up when I tried them out. I had been curious and finally decided to order after reading some other reviews. They stick great and even held up when I jumped up and down to try to see how well they work. I rarely wear anything requiring a strapless bra because everything I've found always make me feel as they are flattening my chest or creating a uniboob lol. I'm not sure how many wears I will get out of it but after washing and drying them they are still super sticky which us highly impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Gfer42754

customer_reviews.title: Showed up broken
customer_reviews.text: Sticks great but the clasp came broken, and even had it not been broken there is no way it would have held anything up. Probably work great for people with small B cups. As stated the adhesive works great and easy to remove and clean. But it probably still only works for those with a smaller chest or someone not looking to have any support, just some basic coverage I was issued a full refund due to it show up broken.
customer_reviews.author: Cali De Vries

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-Waste of Money and Time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specific bra because the one I usually order is no longer available and this one seemed to have a lot of good reviews. I read some negative as well, stating the bra was already peeling off when they first wore it. And that is true! I just received this and tried it on and the bra is already peeling off right after putting it on. I am so disappointed as it does feel like a great sticky bra other than that. But I won’t be able to wear it with it peeling off like that. So ultimately it was a waste of money and time. Sucks! I was actually thinking about wearing it tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: 5 star company!!Great customer service company but Waste of money for product
customer_reviews.text: I am a B cup so thought this would work for me but basically does nothing. Would never actually be able to wear it. Waste of money. **Updated information 7/20/18** I stand by review of the product for my body as it did not work for me. However, soon after I reviewed I received a message from the company apologizing I wasn’t happy with the item and offering to rectify my purchase. That is great customer service I certainly didn’t write the review to get a refund or anything like that. Simply because I read reviews before purchasing most items here.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJSouder

customer_reviews.title: Good for three time usage – perhaps disposable would be a better title
customer_reviews.text: I think I used the Strapless Bra part (not the covers) three times and they stopped sticking. Luckily, I was ordering these as a back up pair for the less expensive ones I already owned and liked very much, made by a different company; not Nidor. I would almost call these disposable because they were sticky enough to use for such a brief period of time. I reverted back to my original pair I had prior to this purchase and still use them to date. Nidor: it cost so much for us ladies to try and look nice with all of these gadgets, perfume, etc.; please don’t misrepresent how many times we can use these. It makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: CO Fiddle Gal

customer_reviews.title: This One Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking awhile for an adhesive bra that will work for my sagging, post-lactating, lost a lot of weight, wide spread D-cup breasts. I found it! This product makes the hot and sticky summer days of Florida bearable. The adhesion is excellent and the structure gives me just the right lift to prevent the moisture build-up underneath that usually leads to a rash. If you are expecting the same lift and support of a standard bra, this isn't for you, but then neither would any other adhesive bra be. However, if you are looking for a decent compromise between standard bras and going bra-less, this is your answer.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Loughborough

customer_reviews.title: My go to 34DD
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these every 5-6months as the stickiness wears out, even with hand washing in a sink. I am a 34DD and i get the D in these. No lift, but it contains and pulls together my boobs.I recommend to put it on, lean forward, turn bra inside out, and stick from the outside edge to the middle, one boob at a time. Not great for hot and humid areas as your sweat can make these babies slide and pop off. Also they attract hair and dust. So after each use put the plastic backing back on and store in a drawer. I try not to wash mine until I notice the stickiness being affected.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cup size fits perfect. I’m a 34B and a B cup fit amazing.
customer_reviews.text: BEST $17 IVE EVER SPENT!!! I’m FLAT chested and this made me feel so pretty and confident! Will be buying more!!!!!! I bought this one bc I had an outfit to wear to an Ariana concert but I wasn’t liking how flat chested i looked in it and it almost drove me to throwing the whole outfit out. I found this and figured I’d give it a shot. So glad I did
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: No Traction or Support
customer_reviews.text: Taking the risk of wearing this strapless bra without a backup plan was the lesson I needed. Walking home in the heat, with saggy boobs.. feeling totally self conscious left me traumatized. The material & craftsmanship of the bra simply can not hold up a heavy bust.. especially while sweating. The material is not breathable, so your sweat collects in the cups, voiding the adhesive, only the have it completely slide off. So unless you're an exhibitionist, I'd suggest looking into a more expensive version of this item (assuming the extra cost went into better quality) or duct tape these suckers to your boobs. Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Stayed on all night, even with dancing!
customer_reviews.text: This sticky bra is great! I had never worn one before, but needed one for a backless bridesmaid dress. I was apprehensive, and was worried about it peeling off mid-ceremony or on the dance floor. However, I had it on for almost 12hours, with no slipping or adjusting needed! Once I got it on right, it STUCK. It survived hours of me busting it up on the dance floor, sweaty pictures and more. It was also very comfortable, and I forgot I was wearing it! It was also comfortable to remove, and looked natural under the fabric of the dress. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arguenot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant about this product. I had had a sticky bra many years ago, but it was a different brand. This one is almost exactly the same. I’m a 36-38 D, and fits perfectly. My breasts get all nicely covered and I don’t have to worry about it sliding, unless I sweat a lot (“a lot” means a lot). This won’t slide off if your skin is clean and you haven’t applied lotion or powder (I usually put lotion in my chest after showering, that’s why I make the clarification). It won’t lift as a normal bra would, but luckily my girls are not too big, and they’re still in place. More than pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Good but noticed rash
customer_reviews.text: I love self adhesive bras. This one in particular fit as expected and sticked to my skin good. It also came with nipple covers which I didn’t know was included! The nude color was perfect, however, I noticed a rash developing on the side of my great when I began using this bra. I didn’t wear it for more than 8 hours and cleaned it after every use. Maybe the silicone is made from a low grade silicone, this is the reason I’m giving it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Frampverg

customer_reviews.title: Braless look without the sagging
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a 36B. I bought a B cup and think they are too small. In their pictures there is a size chart that said I should have bought a C cup. So far I like it. I wore it all day, towards the end of the day it started to get a little uncomfortable and feel like I was wearing a regular strapless bra that I wanted to pull up but maybe that was due to it being the wrong size. It stuck well and was easy to remove although it did peel away a little and the lines were visible under my shirt. We'll see how it lasts but it worked really well for my shirt.
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: For people who don't sweat
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good product but it's just not for people who sweat. I wore it for a friend's wedding. It was October, not hot but I do sweat, especially when anxious. I didn't even make it through photos (within less than 2 hours after sticking the bra on, I realized it had come loose). Luckily, I brought a backup strapless so it was fine but if you are prone to sweating, don't waste your money on this or any product that sticks on.
customer_reviews.author: Svemirka

customer_reviews.title: Finally an invisible bra that works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several of these stick-on bras and this is by far the most durable and most comfortable. Read the directions carefully to ensure the proper fit - the instructions are somewhat counterintuitive. Im a size B, but this stuck well (even in summer), kept things in place, and will give you cleavage if you want it. The nipple covers are a nice additional touch.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Th product is OK. Just OK. I got a lottery ticket for this purchase with my product. I emailed them about it (as stated in the instructions) and again tonight. No answer. Maybe it’s because I won 100% of my purchase paid. I will change my review once that happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kianni

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Works for larger chest
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these, first time from this seller, and product is as expected. Durable and I expect they will last for years just like my other pair. The adhesive is strong and held up in very hot/humid weather, I use these mostly going out dancing and on music festival weekends. I had been looking for a solution to give the girls a bit more shape/hold when I go braless and this does the trick. ALSO, this seller's package comes with INSTRUCTIONS unlike the last time I had bought them! I had not been wearing them correctly and the instructions that come with are very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: ZE

customer_reviews.title: Works alright for money, does not push up since product is heavy.
customer_reviews.text: If you have tried other silicone bras of this same sort, you would note this bra is heavier than other brands. The color, the stickiness, and the front clasp are all good. The breast shape is ok (no pointy issues). I took off stars because of the heavy weight. The weight caused my breasts to be pulled down. I returned this product. I purchased the cloth version of this bra, so I was sensitive to the weight by all silicone bras in general. The pasties are also thicker (too small for the weight issue to bother me). The thicker pasties made them show through most of my summer shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky, I'd recommend
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet, but appear to be sturdy. I recommend you save the plastic that comes on them so that way when your not using them you can put the plastic back on. Came with a little bag to put them in. The box was destroyed so I wasn't thrilled about that. But the sticky part is super sticky I think they'll get the job done nicely. I'll edit my review after I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly stuck-on and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how well they stayed stuck on! and comfortable! until I started to work and sweat and they slid right off! Stay dry and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed... flat cups!
customer_reviews.text: I had a sticky bra before (not from this seller) but I liked it. Every time it's time to get a new one, I try and always find the best one and this one had great reviews and was recommended by Amazon. For the price, I was willing to pay even though it was a little high but when they arrived the cups were flat. Now, idk about the rest of you but to me that's not an attractive shape. I'm sure from the abundance of happy people that have bought this enjoy this product because they probably didn't receive flat cups. I'm not willing to order again. Good luck to the rest of you!
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are my tried and true. I had a double mastectomy and the “gummy” implants. They are heavy and bras bother me. These give me a nice lift, bring in the side boob, and produce some cleavage. They are reusable. Rinse with water. I will say one downside is if you sweat a lot, they may lose their stickiness, so no heavy yard work or exercise in these babies!!
customer_reviews.author: JBAP

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have so many open back bodysuits or tops in my closet. I decided to give the strapless sticky bra a go. Good price point, simple to put on and not uncomfortable. I’ll forget it’s on and I purchased an A cup size. It’s a perfect fit and I’ll purchase a few more for my collection. I have not tried the petals but love that it was an addition.
customer_reviews.author: Niecy

customer_reviews.title: A dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: MY NEW FAVORITE THING! I HAAAAATE bras! Im very busty, usually have to wear an underwire, no such thing as a comfortable bra! But THIS is my dream come true! I was afraid it wouldnt hold the weight of my breasts, but i've worn this all day and i still look great! Im wearing backless tops & dresses all summer thanks to this! Im ordering more right now because THIS BRA is going to be my daily wear for everything all the time! Looks great, holds up, feels like you're wearing nothing at all!!! I LOVE THIS BRA!!
customer_reviews.author: smyle_b

customer_reviews.title: Too small.. order up
customer_reviews.text: I think the product itself is fine, but I de-starred because of the fit. I am surgically a "C" , after reduction surgery. I should have ordered probably 2 sizes up.. to look like the model does ( plus lose about 40 years). I can still use under my solid color scrubs uniforms for more modesty, or even under other clothing. But I wish they covered more tissue, I kinda stuck out all over them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kaitukoff

customer_reviews.title: Order larger than your size so you have a better hold
customer_reviews.text: Order larger than your size so you have a better hold. But yes, I like this product and it works well. This obviously doesn't work for everybody. If you have extremely big boobs and perhaps too saggy after babies, just choose another outfit so you can wear a regular braw. Obviously the girl in the picture has fake boobs and no children, so it looks quite different in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Terena Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Worked great when it was SOOOOO hot and I was sweating
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for my wedding. It was an outdoor Covid 19 wedding and it was 95 degrees. They stuck on great despite me sweating and did not hurt at all to peel off. Also, I am a small A cup and these really did the trick to create cleavage - be sure to apply them almost vertically on the sides for best effect.
customer_reviews.author: Gnomey

customer_reviews.title: Such comfy support and great cleavage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Once you figure out how to stick this thing on it’s so comfortable. It almost feels like there is someone holding the ladies up all day. Yes, it’s a bit of an odd feeling when it’s hot and you are sweating but it still stays on. I’ve washed this four times now and it is still super sticky. I like that you can do a normal comfy bra fit or a big va va voom effect depending on where you stick the cups. An awesome buy and I’m recommending them to everyone. I’m a 34 D and the DD size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fits well for large cup size
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34DD and ordered a size E and it was a perfect fit. The cups really are big / deep enough which is unlike any other adhesive bra on amazon that I’ve tried. The only thing is I seemed to sweat a lot more underneath the material but didn’t really notice while wearing, only after when I took it off. Material isn’t breathable. But overall it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful no show bra!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! Super easy to wash and the adherence hasn’t lessened at all. The only thing I work about is the middle part where it connects together. I fear it’s really thin and may break in the future. But as of now everything works perfect and it’s not uncomfortable at all- it’s not bothersome to wear all day. If you sweat, be advised this does loosen its adherence a bit. I go to the bathroom to address that and everything is fine afterwords!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Possibly never going back to bras
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so, there is a chance I may never go back to regular bras... again. I've only been wearing this for a few days, but I love it. I feel so free with not having to fight with bra straps. I'm a 36c, have nursed four babies and always wore a bra because I felt weighed down. But with these I guess with them being pulled together and kept in place, it doesn't feel so bad. I'm going to give it like a month or so to see how they hold up, but I already have more in my cart to order.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Causey

customer_reviews.title: Great Stick and Look
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of weeks and I'm impressed--better than the StickeeBra brand I bought a couple of years ago. The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is that it doesn't create lift for post-nursing mom boobs, and I believe showing a woman with a massive boob job for your advertising is misleading. Of course those ones are gonna be perky! Anyway, the adhesion is awesome, even when I've been sweating from 100F+ heat and/or exercise all day; they're easy to clean, and the aesthetic look is smooth. I am a DD and bought an E and it fits perfectly--no boob bulge.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well, fit as described- mine came without directions:( ...but I managed anyway
customer_reviews.text: Only reason not 5**** is because Didn’t come with directions...but managed based on other Amazon reviews. Stayed in place all night and I wasn’t worried at slipping. Forgot to take it off when I got home (it was a...long .. night) and still exactly in place in the AM. (I wouldn’t recommend sleeping with it on lol). Haven’t worn a second time yet so I can’t speak to that but seems like it will be fine to wear again). Would have been better to have directions, only reason why I put less than 5*s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best...Overall Meh.
customer_reviews.text: As an A cup I don't have much need for lift or support as much as if I were blessed lol but it is important to me that when I'm wearing an adhesive bra that it actually STICKS to me. After wearing for an hour already the sides had started to lift and I'm concerned about it being able to last an entire night out. All in all I'd say it's good for a quick fix but I'd plan a back up if I was to wear this all night long, can't have silicone cups falling out at random places.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Lifts and sticks real sturdy !
customer_reviews.text: My little mosquito bites looked AMAZING due to this bra! From the first picture to the second! It helped me fill in my dress!! I was so skeptical about this item but oh my goodness I’m truly in love with it now! It stuck on super sturdy, it lifted real nice, and it brought everything together! I will forever vouch for this item! It achieved the unachievable!
customer_reviews.author: Glendaaxo

customer_reviews.title: Yellow and way too small
customer_reviews.text: These are not nude. They are yellow. They run really really small especially rib size but also cup. Might fit very petite women. Purchased soze Bfor daughter who is a solid 36B. They did not cover half her breasts either cup wise or width wise. They looked like they were for a doll.
customer_reviews.author: family

customer_reviews.title: Smooth contours, sticks REALLY well!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, fits really naturally, has a nice shape so everything looks smooth and not squashed and lumpy like some adhesive bras out there. The breast petals may be my favorite though, these are awesome! They’re big enough to cover well and since my boobs are small they even give me a little lift too so the girls end up looking perky. They stick REALLY well, I wouldn’t be afraid of losing them, so I’ll be wearing them all day tomorrow under an open back sweater. This was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: hh

customer_reviews.title: Sticky All Day and Night
customer_reviews.text: I love these sticky boobs. The entire bridal party I was in wore them as well. Stayed on all night dancing. Easy to clean and did not loose its sticky ness after cleaning. Suggestion: Play around with the angles- I have smaller breasts and found wearing the stickies upside down really worked for me
customer_reviews.author: JSchwich

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one who can really go without a bra - real boobs - 50 y/o, it's just not a thing I do. I had bought a dress with a really low back and read about these - I thought what the heck - I'll give it a shot. Got them all positioned on and quite frankly they are perfect. I've worn them another time since then, and I just put them back in the package just the way they came and they worked perfectly for a second time. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ACNEL

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: I wore this dress for a sweet 15 and needed a strapless bra... with no straps! This bra was super comfortable the adhesive was enough to keep on but not hurt when I took them off. Also, it made me feel like my breast were lifted to exactly where They needed to be. The package comes with Hillel covers too. So that if you need to just cover the nipple area you can... in these pics I wore the actual “cutlet” style bra.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bra, it’s sticky and pushes the small girls up!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is going to make my day on my wedding. It makes my very small ladies look absolutely wonderful in my dress. I needed this! I was very unsure of the bra when I bought it but I am very happy I did. It’s sticky and definitely pushes up what cleavage I do have up in the right places! I will for sure be using it more than just on my wedding day and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys are amazing!! At first when I opened them I thought they were really heavy but man do they work! I ordered a different pair from someone else and these by far were my favorite! They fit perfect and they made my boobs look amazing in my bridesmaid dress! I wore them from 12:30pm to 9pm and they never once came loose or moved at all! I am very happy with this purchase and I’ll definitely be using them again! I would highly suggest purchasing these if you have to wear an outfit that you can’t wear a bra with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm not using this bra correctly or something, I mean I've used it straight from the package, and then tried rinsing it with warm water and drying it off, but it just doesn't stick. And it certainly doesn't push anything up for me. The little floral pasties are more useful but the bra itself is useless to me. I think it must be a "me problem" because it obviously works for a lot of other people.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I notice I get a bit of a rash and it itches like crazy if I wear it more than an hour, even in cool weather where I’m not sweating. That alone is a deal breaker. Aslo The adhesive/material is coming off already. I’ve only worn it a couple times, but if you look where the buckle attaches in the middle, the sticky goop is coming off in clumps. I don’t know that this bra is actually going to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so HONEST REVIEW! Maybe this bra just isn't meant for me. I bought the C cup and it seemed a bit too big so I reordered in a B cup and it just looked horrible on me. There was no lift and it certainly didn't enhance anything...if anything, it just made my chest look squished and separated. I did give it 2 stars for the pasties, those are a life saver! Disclaimer: I am a mother who breastfed for almost 3 years, sooo maybe it'll work great for someone who hasn't had the life sucked out of their breasts by an infant...good luck ladies
customer_reviews.author: JFought21

customer_reviews.title: THE ONE THAT FINALLY WORKED FOR ME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried A ZILLION and ONE of these stick-on bras in the last two weeks in preparation for me trip to Miami, but NONE worked, UNTIL I bought THIS ONE!!! The cups are DEEP instead of being shallow and held me together VERY WELL. The stickiness has retained so far, even in heat and sweat. I don't know how many uses I'll eventually get out of it, but so far so good!!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND, ESPECIALLY if you're a "D" or above like I am!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: 3rd purchase - Must be GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Niidor adhesive bra. I didn't know if I'd like the all silicone but I do! It washes easily and dries very quickly. And Niidor is the only brand I have found in DD or E. Price is right and shipping is fast. I wear a D cup in a regular bra but usually get the DD Niidor. This time I decided to try an E and am very pleased with the coverage and, as always, am surprised by the lift and support. I love the freedom the adhesive bra gives.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: I was warned, but tried these anyway...
customer_reviews.text: This product was unwearable. I purchased the right size, but there was absolutely no "push up" effect, and it looked super weird with a shirt on. I was extremely disappointed, even though a friend had expressed the same dissatisfaction previously. I figured I'd try it anyway. Nope. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love these adhesive bras- work so much better than a strapless bra! They actually stay in place and no fidgeting or slippage to deal with! They stick where you put them. I have used them for a couple years now and you do have to replace them as the sticky starts to wear out. But they last a long time. I bought them for a backless dress and now wear them with any dress that is spaghetti straps, strapless or backless. They are a vacation staple for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: These come in handy
customer_reviews.text: Great for bathing suit or low cut shirts with back open. I haven’t swim in it so I’m not sure if they would come off. Doubt it though . Hard to get everything positioned right but worth it. I leave the snap shut when putting on,that helped. They stayed put the nipple thing I have no idea what that was for. I normally wear a 36 C and that was tooo small . Ordered D cup and it fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jill Calton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this under my maternity dress for my baby shower and it was a 100 degree day. I was sweating like crazy! They held up really well! They don’t hold up your boobs or push them up, they more so push them together. When I took them off after wearing them for 7 hours there was visible sweat on the inside of the bra. I was so surprised how well they stayed on even with so much sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend
customer_reviews.text: First time ever buying something like this. I’m a size 34B but I’m not a perky B. I’m a mom of three so my breast do have a bit of sag to them. Embarrassing but I do want the moms to know this product is amazing and helps me get the Nice perky cleavage that we all wish we still had. Haha. So yes I do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Candice Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it! Is so comfortable, and the adhesion holds perfectly. You're not afraid that could fall at any minute, because is firm on place without hurting your skin (and I have sensitive skin, so I can say it). I'm definitely buying this product again. 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: Ana Florida

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the pics/videos fool you.
customer_reviews.text: While this product helps with holding the girls in place and there are no bra lines (love) I cannot get it to make my boobs to look anything like the girls in the video. I have implants mind you so my boobs are perky without any kind of assistance. I have tried a few different sizes and several diff techniques. It’s just not meant to be. Oh and if you try to lift them super high to get that push up effect the adhesive does not hold but for a few min and your back saggy again. But it’s a better alternative to a strapless so, to me, it’s worth that sacrifice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for real boobs!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWFUL! I don’t know how anyone has got it to work for them, especially those with larger cup sizes. I’m a C cup and these did not lift whatsoever. The model in the photo clearly has silicone implants that stay in place naturally so it gives this product the illusion of working better than it does. I tired and tried and tried to get these to work by readjusting every which way. These are not good for natural real boobs. There is no lift and not nearly enough stickiness to lift your heavy boobs. You need fake ones that don’t move and sit exactly where they were put. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Allison Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great stick to hold up the laddies!
customer_reviews.text: This adveshive bra is SUPER sticky. I wore this bra around the house to see how well it would stick before wearing it out on an occasion. I am happy that it stayed on and that you could not see the edges. My breasts are two different sizes, one is a C and the other a D. I ordered the size C and it got both breasts well enough. It is nice to be able to have a seamless look when I want to look nice, not having a boob bulge or bra gap. :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lassinger

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bra. It was a learning curve trying to place it correctly but when you do OMG it's so comfortable. Your shoulders and back will thank you. I have D cup boobies and it worked and held them up to the heavens probably about 20 times untill it became unsticky. The ONLY downfalls are that 1. You will notice your underboob sweat more because you wont have a fabric there wicking it away and 2. It only last about 20 wears. OH. ALSO it comes with 2 flower pasties, they are nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: These are good when you aren't wearing anything tight.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I need a size up or what because my girls do NOT look like the models when I put these on. But I do like putting them on when I'm wearing a looser tank or a tank top. I don't get as *much* support or uh, squeezing, as I'd like but this works better than those annoying strapless bras. The little flower nipple covers are cute and I like those too! The texture is a little weird but also fun. Always makes me laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gruber

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: Alright so I am an OG sticky boob fan! I love these things and I wear them alllll the time! I have nursed four kids so I need ones that will actually give me lift and keep my girls in. I have ALWAYS splurged and purchased the ones from Target and Victorias Secret however for this price I never will again. This is a SMOKING deal buy these! These come with the petal pasties as well! I wash them as instructed and hang dry and they are ready for use the next day. Perfect for the strapless summer tops or dresses with low backs. Very flattering!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Smith

customer_reviews.title: These have become a summer must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these & I bought another more expensive brand that also had great reviews. This one was way better tho. I bought it for the dress I wore to my brothers wedding, but the worked so well I’ve been using them for all my backless sundresses & backless shirts. I used to go braless but now I can add a little lift to my ‘girls’ with this bra. They stayed put for hours even in the summer heat. I was really impressed that I didn’t have any issues anytime I wore them ( both times I wore them for at least 8 hrs & was very active)
customer_reviews.author: tiny_tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Fits good and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sticky bra. My bra size is a 32C, I ordered the B though since I'm not a large C and it fit me great. Only complaint is the adhesive started coming off in the corner near the hook my first time wearing it so not sure how long it will actually last. I've worn it 3 times so far and it's still works good for now though. The adhesive is a little different than other silicone pasties I've worn before, it physically comes off in tiny sticky globs(?) instead of just losing it's stickiness but I do like it over all
customer_reviews.author: Jane

product_meta.title: Niidor Adhesive Bra Strapless Sticky Invisible Push up Silicone Bra for Backless Dress with Nipple Covers
feature_bullets: STRONG STICKINESS, NO SLIPPING DOWN - Niidor strapless bra is made of sticky and skin-friendly silicone adhesive, unlike other inferior material which would easily slip down and irritate skin, Niidor strapless bra sticks on perfectly without causing pain, providing you an unprecedented experience

CONVENIENT AND STRONG CLIP - With the unique front clip design, our strapless bra can easily to clasp and unclasp. Strong enough and help to gather your breasts, bringing you a busty and charming deep v-shaped cleavage

SEAMLESS AND INVISIBLE - Our bra is strapless, very soft and clear, the micro edge design and nude color adhesive silicone make it seamless and invisible under your clothing in a comfortable and natural way. Nobody would notice that you are wearing our strapless bra

BE AN EYE CATCHING WINNER IN ALL OCCASIONS - Our strapless bra is the greatest companion to outfits, such as backless dresses, off shoulder gowns, halter dress, wedding dress, etc. No more embarrassing showing bra straps

EASY-CLEANING & REUSABLE - It is easy to clean only need to simply wet the adhesive surface with warm water and mild detergent and then air to dry it. This strapless bra can be reusable for many times with good maintain. Free Gift: 2PCs sticky Silicone Nipple Covers
